Bibliographic references: BMC Greek (Ptolemies) / Catalogue of Greek coins: the Ptolemies, kings of Egypt (p235, 1) (1254)
Taylor Combe 1814 / Veterum Populorum et Regum Numi qui in Museo Britannico Adversantur (The Coins of Ancient Peoples and Kings Preserved in the British Museum)
Acquisition notes: This denotes the first catalogue produced of the British Museum coin and medal collections by Taylor Combe, the then Keeper of Antiquities, in 1814.
